title: Hammer
description: This tool is perfect for driving nails, staples, and anything you may need to strike! It is also very useful for removing them too!

title: Axe
description: This tool is used for splitting wood, and anyhting else that needs to be cut. Very useful in many situations.

title: 2 foot Leveler
description: Awesome for usage on anything to make sure it is level. Perfect for any project that you need to level something in.

title: Measuring Tape
description: Perfect for practically all projects you are working on. Gives direct measurements for cutting and much more. Very useful in many situations!

title: Phillips Screwdriver
description: This screwdriver is used for screws with the phillips head. Useful to tighten screws for woodworking, assembly, and many other situations

title: Sandpaper
description: This item is particularly useful in smoothing out edges and rough sides of metal, wood, and plastic. Allows for smooth finishes and soft edges.
